title: War of Kings (2009) #5 (GRANOV VARIANT)
description:
The high impact, critically acclaimed sci-fi epic rages towards its explosive climax! Last issue’s jaw-dropping cliffhanger has everyone scrambling! Vulcan’s once unbeatable and vast war machine is grinding to a halt! Black Bolt’s forces are struggling to survive! It’s all coming down to the final clash, king vs. king! But where will the other power players place their loyalty, and can anyone imagine a solution as extreme as the one Medusa is proposing? The Universe is about to change forever in what
IGN.com calls “a veritable dream for science fiction/fantasy fans…War of Kings is event comics Rated T  …$3.99
